APP__TEST_URL.desc: URL that the App will be available at once started.

CMD__DOCKER_BUILD.desc: Command to build specific or all Docker containers.

CMD__DOCKER_START.desc: Command to start the built Container(s), so a Dev can verify before it's deployed.

CMD__COMPILE_ASSETS.value: docker compose run <SERVICE>-dev zsh -c "npm i" && docker compose run -e NODE_ENV=production <SERVICE>-dev zsh -c "npm run build"
CMD__COMPILE_ASSETS.desc: Command to compile any assets that may be needed by Docker, shipped off to S3, etc.

DOCKER__REGISTRY_DOMAIN.desc: When the registry domain is blank, it defaults to `$DEFAULT_REGISTRY`.

REPO__API_URL.desc: Optional when `REPO__HOST` is `github`, otherwise required. Something like `https://<HOSTNAME>/api/v1`.
